description: All tables related to Azure Sentinel Watchlists.

tables.name: Watchlist
tables.description: Azure Sentinel Watchlist contains imported data from CSV files that can be used to join or filter as an alert/incident condition.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the event was generated.

columns.name: AzureTenantId
columns.description: The AAD tenant ID to which this Watchlist table belongs.

columns.name: WatchlistId
columns.description: The Resource Manager Watchlist resource name.

columns.name: WatchlistItemId
columns.description: The Watchlist item unique ID.

columns.name: WatchlistName
columns.description: The display name of Watchlist.

columns.name: WatchlistAlias
columns.description: The unique string referring to the Watchlist.

columns.name: Source
columns.description: The input source of the Watchlist.

columns.name: Provider
columns.description: The input provider of the Watchlist.
The JSON object with the user who created the Watchlist or Watchlist item, including: Object ID, email and name.
The JSON object with the user who last updated the Watchlist or Watchlist item, including: Object ID, email and name.

columns.name: CreatedTimeUTC
columns.description: The time (UTC) when the Watchlist or Watchlist item was first created.

columns.name: LastUpdatedTimeUTC
columns.description: The time (UTC) when Watchlist or Watchlist item was last updated.

columns.name: Notes
columns.description: The notes provided by user.

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: The JSON array of tags provided by user.

columns.name: DefaultDuration
columns.description: The JSON object describing the default duration to live that each item of a Watchlist should inherit on creation. The default duration has this format : P(n)Y(n)M(n)DT(n)H(n)M(n)S, where P, Y, M, DT, H, M and S are invariant. For example, P3Y6M4DT12H30M9S represents a duration of three years, six months, four days, twelve hours, thirty minutes, and nine seconds.

columns.name: TimeToLive
columns.description: The time to live for a Watchlist record, expressed as a date and time of day (e.g. 2020-08-20T17:00:00.9618037Z). Its original value is inherited from Watchlistâ€™s default duration. If TimeToLive passes, the record is considered deleted. A record's duration can be extended at any time by updating the TimeToLive value.
The JSON object with key-value pairs from the input Watchlist source.
The JSON object with Azure Sentinel entity mapping to input columns.

columns.name: CorrelationId
columns.description: The ID for correlated events.

columns.name: SearchKey
columns.description: The SearchKey is used to optimize query performance when using watchlists for joins with other data. For example, enable a column with IP addresses to be the designated SearchKey field, then use this field to join in other event tables by IP address.

columns.name: WatchlistCategory
columns.description: The Watchlist category provided by user.

columns.name: _DTTimestamp
columns.description: The time (UTC) when the event was generated.

columns.name: _DTItemId
columns.description: The Watchlist or Watchlist item unique ID. As an example, a Watchlist 'RiskyUsers' can contain Watchlist item 'Name:John Doe; email:johndoe@contoso.com'. A Watchlist item has unique ID and belongs to a Watchlist. The containing Watchlist can identified using the 'WatchlistId'.

columns.name: _DTItemType
columns.description: Distinguish between a Watchlist and a Watchlist item. As an example, a Watchlist 'RiskyUsers' can contain Watchlist item 'Name:John Doe; email:johndoe@contoso.com'. A Watchlist item type will belong to a Watchlist type and the containing Watchlist can identified using the 'WatchlistId'.

columns.name: _DTItemStatus
columns.description: Was the Watchlist or Watchlist item created, updated or deleted by user. As an example, a Watchlist 'RiskyUsers' can contain Watchlist item 'Name:John Doe; email:johndoe@contoso.com'. If a Watchlist is added, the the status would be 'Created'. If the name of the Watchlist is updated from 'RiskyUsers' to 'RiskyEmployees' the status would be 'Updated'.
